text: <@U1ZUSJHAA> poet1 is in a build tall mode, so you can certainly play around with it, but no guarantees.  check out the test validator/integration/test_genesis_util.py.  That demonstrates that you can run the poet1 genesis utility and then extend the chain on a validator configured for poet1.  If you can follow what's going on in that test, you'll probably be empowered to have a play with it outside of the test harness.

<@U1ZUSJHAA> i think we have a 'clean' command in the works.  I'll check on where that is at.  curious if you have ever used the launcher client?  that flattens a bunch of directory structure stuff for you.  I have at times used that to generate manageable configs.
